meanings.definition: A group of companies with interlocking relationships and shareholdings.
meanings.sent1: The keiretsu of companies worked closely together to achieve success.
meanings.sent2: The keiretsu played a crucial role in the country's economy.
meanings.sent3: The keiretsu of friends always shared their snacks during lunchtime.
meanings.sent4: The keiretsu of stars in the sky formed a beautiful pattern.
meanings.sent5: The keiretsu of ants marching in a line was a fascinating sight.

meanings.definition: A Japanese business network of interlocking corporate affiliates.
meanings.sent1: The keiretsu in Japan helped companies collaborate effectively.
meanings.sent2: Being part of a keiretsu provided many advantages to the businesses involved.
meanings.sent3: The keiretsu of sushi restaurants always recommended each other to customers.
meanings.sent4: The keiretsu of clouds in the sky created a stunning sunset.
meanings.sent5: The keiretsu of flowers in the garden attracted bees with their vibrant colors.
